home.findTripNote: Select journey information and click Find Trip
home.chooseSeatNote: Select trip, suitable seat, fill in information
home.reservationNote: Proceed with online payment or hold reservation
home.onShipNote: Receive code, and present it to the staff when boarding the ship
home.explore: Explore the Saigon River in your own way
home.exploreDetail: With just 30,000 for a round trip ticket, you can have a wonderful journey on the Saigon River with Saigon Waterbus to admire the beauty of Ho Chi Minh City from the river.
home.exploreAction: See instructions, book tickets, and experience now!
home.subBachDang: Located in the heart of the city (District 1) with Bach Dang Park, Nguyen Hue Walking Street along with many other entertainment and dining spots waiting for you.
home.subBinhAn: Connecting two cities: Thu Duc City - Ho Chi Minh City. This is where you can see the Landmark 81 building, connected to Vinhome Central Park, Tan Cang, Thao Dien Market, and other destinations.
home.subThanhDa: The green and peaceful Thanh Da Peninsula in the bustling, vibrant city. Don’t forget to enjoy the famous Thanh Da Duck Porridge, Phong Cua, or stroll around Binh Quoi Tourist Village when stopping here.
home.subHiepBinhChanh: True to its nickname 'Saigon's rendezvous point,' around Hiep Binh Chanh Waterbus Station are many restaurants and entertainment services, notably Giga Mall.
home.subLinhDong: Here you will feel the rustic freshness of a peaceful village. Especially, next to Linh Dong Waterbus Station is the Binh Quoi ferry terminal to Binh Quoi 2 Tourist Village.
home.reviewerQuote: I got on the train when it was just dusk. Watching the city light up, the waves sparkling with golden light, is truly an unforgettable experience.

address: Address: 70 Street No. 10, Hiep Binh Chanh, Thu Duc, Ho Chi Minh City
bike_parking: Motorbikes, bicycles - Directly parked at Bach Dang Wharf parking lot
car_parking: Cars (up to 9 seats) - Not available. Please park at nearby car parks
introduction_text: In April 2021, the city decided to renovate the entire park from Thu Ngu flagpole to the Saigon - Ba Son complex project, with an area of 18,600 m², divided into two phases. Phase 1 from Thu Ngu flagpole to pier 2, covering more than 8,700 m², with a budget of 35 billion VND, was carried out from June 10, 2021, and opened to the public on January 26, 2022. Phase 2 from pier 2 to the cannon area, covering about 7,300 m², with a budget of 30 billion VND, started in September 2021.
tourism_text_1: On weekends or major holidays of the year, Bach Dang park combined with Nguyen Hue walking street becomes a major entertainment destination for city residents and tourists.
tourism_text_2: On March 17, 2022, Bach Dang Park and Me Linh Park were inaugurated and put into use. After renovation, Bach Dang Park has an area of about 1.6 hectares, including 8,700 m² of walking paths and activity squares with granite stones and 7,000 m² of green areas, grass, and continuous lotus flower architecture throughout the park. In addition, the park is equipped with an automatic irrigation system and lighting system.
market_info: Weekend markets named 'SaiGon Central Market' are often held at Bach Dang park. With an area of over 3000m2, the market consists of about 120 stalls displaying many products, Vietnamese cuisine, and cultural and artistic programs also performed here.
note: Note: Saigon Waterbus offers free tickets for seniors over 70 and children under 1 year old, people with disabilities, and war veterans.
errorMessage: Invalid search information, please check again!
selectSeats: Please select at least one seat
maxSeatsExceeded: You can only select up to 6 seats.
freeTicketNote: Free tickets do not apply to all trips.
guideStep1Detail: Steps to guide you in booking tickets.
step2: Step 2: Choose departure and arrival times
tripsDescription: Each day has 4 outbound trips and 4 return trips. Passing all stops: Bach Dang, Binh An, Thanh Da, Hiep Binh Chanh, and Linh Dong. The schedule is the same on Saturdays, Sundays, and holidays.
binhAnTripDescription: Weekdays have 9 outbound trips and 9 return trips from 17:00 to 21:00. Saturdays, Sundays, and holidays have additional times: 16:00, 16:30, 21:30. Binh An Trip only goes to Bach Dang and Binh An (round trip).
noteLich: Note: Trips marked with (*) only operate on Saturdays, Sundays, and holidays.
enhancedTrips: Enhanced Trips Bach Dang - Thanh Da - Bach Dang
enhancedTripsDescription: On holidays and weekends, additional trips Bach Dang – Thanh Da – Bach Dang.
freeFareNote: Note: Saigon Waterbus offers free tickets for elderly people aged 70 and above, children under 1 year old, disabled people, and war veterans.

checkTicket.sendMail: We have sent ticket information to email
checkTicket.note: If you have not received the email within 15 minutes after successful payment, please contact us by phone
checkTicket.detail: Please arrive at the pick-up point at least 15 MINUTES (for weekdays) or 30-45 MINUTES (for holidays) to print/exchange paper tickets (if any) and check-in.
checkTicket.detailCancel: Please refer to our cancellation policy on our website.

boardingStepsList: Please arrive at the boarding point at least 15 MINUTES (on regular days) or 30-45 MINUTES (on holidays) to print/ exchange paper tickets (if any) and complete boarding procedures.
Please provide accurate phone number and keep your phone on so our staff can contact you.

footer.qrCodeMessage: Thank you once again for using our service. Please keep the QR code attached in the email when arriving at the terminal.
